General.Name: Dongguan Aohai Technology Co
General.Description: Dongguan Aohai Technology Co., Ltd. research, develops, produces, and sells consumer electronics products in China and internationally. The company products operate in smart power charge, power adaptor, GaN black technology, wireless charging, mobile power, smart device, power energy, and network energy. Its products widely used in smartphones, tablets, laptops, smart wearable devices, smart homes, artificial intelligence equipment, power tools, data, independent brands, and other fields. Dongguan Aohai Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.
